Address.label: Address
Address.value: N56 W17000 RIDGEWOOD DRIVE, MENOMONEE FALLS, Wisconsin, 53051, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kohl's operates 1,165 department stores in 49 states that sell moderately priced private-label and national brand clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and home furnishings. Most of these stores are in strip centers. Kohl's also operates a large digital sales business. Women's apparel is Kohl's largest category, having generated 27% of its 2021 sales. The retailer, headquartered in Menomonee Falls, Wisconsin, opened its first department store in 1962.
